RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the agent: United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo B: conducted an interrogation of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and had sufficient information to arrest him on the spot once he arrived at the traffic stop on Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: addressed the issue of reasonable suspicion for the stop and considered factors including vehicle registration and route taken
